pullrequest.title: posterior compatibility with sublabel output mode

content.raw: I'm a little confused by this sentence unless I'm reading this wrong. The file name itself isn't named "label.sublabel" correct? I was under the impression it was the suffix before the file extension. If it is just "label.subable.wig" for example consider changing "identified in" to "identified as".
content.html: I'm a little confused by this sentence unless I'm reading this wrong. The file name itself isn't named "label.sublabel" correct? I was under the impression it was the suffix before the file extension. If it is just "label.subable.wig" for example consider changing "identified in" to "identified as".
